info.text: music.fuit.es is an 'anarchival' music platform, a space for the process of an album to continue on after its release. In addition to being uploaded in their finished state to streaming platforms, a selection of sound fragments from each album; one-shots, samples, layers, loops, are released into the music.fuit.es anarchive where they begin a new process of composition and recomposition within the scatter of other releases.

releases.name: RollingUnrolling
releases.description:
Tiny sounds by Matisse A-M, Taaaaawnyyy, Teah Morales, Myra Morales, Diego Gil, Radiolip, Memory Foam, Sher Doruff, Brian Massumi, Christian Brun Del Re, hh, Eddying Jackson, Oscar Talbot, Keerthi Basavarajaiah and certainly many more.

Cello on Prática by Laurence Gaudreau.
Clarinet by Jonah Bild-Lowrie.
Saxophone on Prática and Itchy by Ludo Désert.

Words & vocals by Anouk Hoogendoorn.
Translation to Portuguese for Prática by Erneste
Words & vocals on Superabundant by Ben Muñoz.
Music and production by Ben Muñoz.

Mixing on Sync Sink and Prática by Pierre Guerineau
Mastering by Pierre Guerineau

Artwork by Liz Talley (@nice_folk)

Released May 24, 2024

releases.name: Too Heavy To Fly
releases.description:
Jonah Orion Bild-Lowrie _ Vocals, Clarinet, Rhodes, Piano, Synths
Vincent Paradis-Montplaisir _ Vocals, Guitar, Bass
Christiaan Maria Brun del Re _ Percussion
Rupina Tashijan _ Vocals
Ludovic Desert _ Saxophone (on Forgot the Leaves)
Faïza Fehri _ Voice (on Witness of these Walls)
Benjamin Muñoz _ Mastering

Released July 29, 2021

tips: to upload a thingie, open the pocket and click upload
to move a thingie, click and drag it

to drag and drop a thingie into your pocket, the compost or a page,
click and drag while holding shift (chrome, firefox), or holding command (safari)
to add a text thingie, hold option and click anywhere on the white background
to remove a thingie from the page, drag and drop it into the open compost

to delete a thingie from the site, once it has been composted, navigate to the compost. There, you'll be able to delete it by option-clicking it: When it's highlighted, click the 'delete' button in the bottom left corner.
to edit a thingie, click on it while holding option

in edit mode, a thingie can be rotated with ← and →, brought forward or sent backward with ↑ and ↓,
or resized by making a pinch gesture while hovering over it
while editing, other options will appear to the right depending on the type of thingie
when audio is on, sound thingies can be heard by hovering over them with the mouse
tips_touchdevice: to upload a thingie, open the pocket and click upload
to move a thingie, tap it. Once it's highlighted you'll be able to drag it with one finger
while it's highlighted, you can also rotate or resize a thingie by pinching it with two fingers
to edit a thingie, while it's highlighted, open the editor in the bottom left corner
in the editor, you can move it to the page, the pocket or the compost
other options appear in the editor depending on what type of thingie you are editing
to delete a thingie from the site, once it has been composted, navigate to the compost. There, you'll be able to delete it in the editor panel.
when audio is on, sound thingies can be heard by taping on them
